message.body: No :) but I redid my bed. My room def has them
I just made my bed an island again
It always was but I stupidly let a corner of the blanket touch the floor for awhile during the day and BAM 5 bites that night
Ok. I'm going to call Beth. Did you get a chance to call her?
I just spoke to Beth. She is going to call Cindy & find out when she can get back out there. She is hoping for tomorrow.
Beth said it would be helpful to gather as much information as possible. The part of the blanket that hit the fl
The part of the blanket that hit the floor - which side of the bed / room was it on? The side closest to the bathroom? Or David's room? Or the exterior wall?
We are are trying to figure out the direction they are coming from.
Cool. I'll let you know if she is coming by tomorrow.

I just spoke with both Beth & Cindy. Cindy said she will be there around 6. Obviously she has been running late so I'm not sure if it will be 6 or more like 7. Will you be home or is your bedroom door unlocked?
Oh ok! My bedroom door is unlocked yes.
